ROM.Changelog:
-Now its version 3.2 -OTA updates Fully working -Removed Greenlines of Camera when taking photos -SElinux is now Enforcing -Fixed many selinux denials -Kernel improvements -Kernel cleanup -Doze improvements -Power optimisations -Fixed Wakelock bug -Reduced SS delay to 300ms -Launcherr3 improvements -MediaCodec improvements -Added 0.25 and 0.75 animation step -Now All official builds are USER variant. -Removed Haloplug -Merged Latest CAF tag -Removed few lineage things # Note : _Clean flash is always recommended. Bug reports are not appreciated if not clean flashed. Builds will be available soon when maintainers will get free time. So don't ask for ETAs._
